nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.application

Interface ApplicationServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApplicationService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationServiceImpl

    public interface ApplicationServiceLocal
extends ApplicationService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

    • Method Detail

      • awakePollingTask

        void awakePollingTask(java.lang.Class<? extends PollingTask> type)
        Attempts to awake a PollingTask with the given type. Will have no effect if cyclos.disableScheduling = true in cyclos.properties
